content: this semi-circle lace shawl/scarf wraps around the upper body and the bobbles can be used instead of a shawl-pin very nifty you can also wear it as a scarf i also made two shawls and put it together with buttons to form a poncho if you use a dk 3 weight yarn make sure to use a 4 5mm crochet hook and you will need a bit of extra yarn max 650 meters i ve made it in fingering and dk it is suitable for summer and winter depending on the yarn you choose this pattern is beginner friendly stitches used chains single_crochet double_crochet this pattern has a hyperlink to a video tutorial should you prefer the tutorial above the written pattern materials used recommended red heart it s a wrap rainbow 150g 600m 2 weight yarn 45% cotton/55% acrylic blend size 4mm crochet hook wool needle to work in ends scissors 4x stitch markers optional abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet sts - stitches st - stitch yo - yarn over hook slip_stitch - slip_stitch skip - skip my facebook group private https //www facebook com/groups/1605796789579600/ youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/omgrannysquare my email omgrannysquare@gmail com
